virtual FDO_API GisXmlSaxContext* FdoXmlDeserializable::GetSaxContext (   )  [virtual]
 

Gets the SAX context to pass to the GisXmlSaxHandler callbacks. Classes derived from FdoXmlDeserializable can override this function to specify a SAX context with class-specific information.

Returns:
Returns NULL by default, the default GisXmlSaxContext is used. The default provides basic error handling functionality.

Reimplemented in FdoPhysicalSchemaMappingCollection, and FdoFeatureSchemaCollection.

Comments or suggestions? Send us feedback.
